title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo—CLI and Go library for pulling, running, and serving Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama HTTP API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio wrapper; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama models into any chain, agent, or retrieval pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that clones ChatGPT UX—local chat, file uploads, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM SDK for Ollama exposing synchronous, reactive and Kotlin-coroutine clients.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, chat history and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot template pre-wired to Ollama with Tailwind styling and Docker build.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Starter repo showing RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in <100 lines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration exposing Ollama as a REST client bean with YAML config.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript developers; 30 kB, zero dependencies.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package; install via pip and access chat, generate, embed, list, pull APIs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming for C# 11.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers slash commands using any Ollama model with per-guild config.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes and insert completions.
